title: USWE Trail-Ready SHRED & FLOW MTB Packs Stash Gear, Don’t Bounce
content:
Are you tired of your MTB trail pack doing the monkey dance while you’re trying to send it? Today, Swedish pack builder USWE releases two new MTB packs to deliver the snug action you need. USWE’s trail-ready FLOW and SHRED offer solid storage and organization, proprietary No Dancing Monkey and Snug-Me systems to limit bounce, […]

The post USWE Trail-Ready SHRED & FLOW MTB Packs Stash Gear, Don’t Bounce appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
